Kalkulator klasowy
  • calculator
  • calculator module
  • Zobacz źródło strony

calculator module

class calculator.Calculator

Klasy bazowe: object

A simple calculator class to perform basic arithmetic operations.

add(a, b)

Add two numbers.

Parametry:

  • a (float or int) – The first number.

  • b (float or int) – The second number.

Zwraca:

The result of a + b.

Typ zwracany:

float or int

divide(a, b)

Divide one number by another.

Parametry:

  • a (float or int) – The dividend.

  • b (float or int) – The divisor.

Zwraca:

The result of a / b.

Typ zwracany:

float

Wyrzuca:

ValueError – If b is equal to zero.

multiply(a, b)

Multiply two numbers.

Parametry:

  • a (float or int) – The first number.

  • b (float or int) – The second number.

Zwraca:

The result of a * b.

Typ zwracany:

float or int

subtract(a, b)

Subtract one number from another.

Parametry:

  • a (float or int) – The number to subtract from.

  • b (float or int) – The number to subtract.

Zwraca:

The result of a - b.

Typ zwracany:

float or int
